software.amazon.smithy.codegen.freemarker

Class FreeMarkerEngine.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • software.amazon.smithy.codegen.freemarker.FreeMarkerEngine.Builder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SmithyBuilder<TemplateEngine>
    Enclosing class:
    FreeMarkerEngine

    public static final class FreeMarkerEngine.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
implements SmithyBuilder<TemplateEngine>
    Builds a new FreeMarker template engine.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TemplateEngine build()
      Creates an immutable object that is created from the properties that have been set on the builder.
      FreeMarkerEngine.Builder classLoader(java.lang.Class classLoader)
      Sets a Class to use for loading templates.
      FreeMarkerEngine.Builder classLoader(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
      Sets a ClassLoader to use for loading templates.
      FreeMarkerEngine.Builder disableHelpers()
      Disables the automatic registering of the StringUtils and CaseUtils variables in every template.
      FreeMarkerEngine.Builder disableObjectWrapper()
      Disables the automatic registering of the Smithy ObjectWrapper that will make FreeMarker treat Smithy's Node objects like normal values (for example, an ObjectNode can be accessed like a Map, an ArrayNode can be accessed like a List, and all of the scalar nodes like StringNode, BooleanNode, NumberNode, and BooleanNode are accessed like a Java built-in types), empty Optional values are treated like null, an Optional with a value is automatically unwrapped, and a Stream is treated like an Iterator.
      FreeMarkerEngine.Builder putDefaultProperties(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map)
      Adds default properties to every template's data model.
      FreeMarkerEngine.Builder putDefaultProperty(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object value)
      Adds a default property to every template's data model.
      FreeMarkerEngine.Builder setConfig(freemarker.template.Configuration config)
      Sets a custom FreeMarker Configuration object for use cases that require full customization of the template engine.
      FreeMarkerEngine.Builder templateLoader(freemarker.cache.TemplateLoader templateLoader)
      Sets a custom FreeMarker template loader.

      • setConfig

        public FreeMarkerEngine.Builder setConfig(freemarker.template.Configuration config)
        Sets a custom FreeMarker Configuration object for use cases that require full customization of the template engine.
        Parameters:
        config - Configuration object to set.
        Returns:
        Returns the builder.

      • disableObjectWrapper

        public FreeMarkerEngine.Builder disableObjectWrapper()
        Disables the automatic registering of the Smithy ObjectWrapper that will make FreeMarker treat Smithy's Node objects like normal values (for example, an ObjectNode can be accessed like a Map, an ArrayNode can be accessed like a List, and all of the scalar nodes like StringNode, BooleanNode, NumberNode, and BooleanNode are accessed like a Java built-in types), empty Optional values are treated like null, an Optional with a value is automatically unwrapped, and a Stream is treated like an Iterator.
        Returns:
        Returns the builder.

      • disableHelpers

        public FreeMarkerEngine.Builder disableHelpers()
        Disables the automatic registering of the StringUtils and CaseUtils variables in every template.
        Returns:
        Returns the builder.

      • templateLoader

        public FreeMarkerEngine.Builder templateLoader(freemarker.cache.TemplateLoader templateLoader)
        Sets a custom FreeMarker template loader.
        Parameters:
        templateLoader - Template loader to set.
        Returns:
        Returns the builder.

      • classLoader

        public FreeMarkerEngine.Builder classLoader(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Sets a ClassLoader to use for loading templates.

        Using a ClassLoader will require that templates are loaded using the entire package name to a resource with no leading "/".

        Parameters:
        classLoader - ClassLoader to use for loading templates.
        Returns:
        Returns the builder.

      • classLoader

        public FreeMarkerEngine.Builder classLoader(java.lang.Class classLoader)
        Sets a Class to use for loading templates.

        Using a Class allows for relative loading of templates from the Class package.

        Parameters:
        classLoader - ClassLoader to use for loading templates.
        Returns:
        Returns the builder.
